mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT i.acct_id FROM t_push_inform AS i JOIN t_user_house AS h ON h.community_id = i.acct_id AND h.check_status = 1 AND h.deleted = 0 AND i.deleted = 0 WHERE ( SELECT COUNT( 1 ) FROM t_push_inform_del AS d WHERE i.acct_id = d.acct_id AND d.uid = #{uid} ) = 0 AND h.uid = #{uid}
SELECT DISTINCT i.acct_id FROM t_push_inform AS i WHERE i.push_target = 0 AND i.deleted = 0 AND ( SELECT count( 1 ) FROM t_push_inform_del AS d WHERE d.uid = #{uid} AND d.acct_id = i.acct_id ) = 0
SELECT acct_id, acct_name, acct_avatar, push_title, create_time FROM t_push_inform WHERE acct_id = #{id} and deleted = 0 ORDER BY create_time DESC LIMIT 1
